SEARCH
Package socialmedia

Class Post

java.lang.Object
socialmedia.Account
socialmedia.Post
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Comment, Endorsement
public class Post extends Account
This class stores information on each post of an individual Account in the social media platforms. Posts can be created, removed and have a caption up to 100 characters. The class is a subclass of Account class.
Author:
Aisha, Saida
